content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-01-23 #21017 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in .
Is this the first closed-pr reaction in the wild?
actually, it seems there are a bunch of messages in #maths > Poset games that may have gotten the reaction earlier?

Ok, great! I was not trying to locate the first usage, but rather getting empirical evidence that the action works.

So, knowing that there's more of usage of the action is even better!
